Template.HtmlPart:
DEVELOPMENT


Greetings {{name}},

We can't wait to present you with a simple, understandable list of devices perfectly suited for your needs.


Our human tech gurus are standing by to get searching for the perfect devices for you. Once you've given us the moola we need to fund our coffee, our caffeinated tech gurus will get back to you within the next 24-48hrs.


We are excited you chose to use our service and we will try our best to impress you.


Best regards,

HMCTECH team
